Sudoku Board Module

class tests.test_sudoku_board.TestSudokuBoard(methodName='runTest')[source]

Test cases for the SudokuBoard class

The SudokuBoard class is responsible for verifying the sudoku board from the given sudoku board (2D list).

These tests ensure the class handles various validation and 2D list scenarios correctly.

test__raise_error_for_invalid_column_board()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class raises a ValueError when the sudoku board contains a column with duplicate values

test__raise_error_for_invalid_row_board()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class raises a ValueError when the sudoku board contains a row with duplicate values

test__raise_error_for_invalid_square_board()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class raises a ValueError when the sudoku board contains a 3x3 square with duplicate values

test_raise_error_for_invalid_characters_board()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class raises a ValueError when the sudoku board contains invalid characters

test_raise_error_for_invalid_file()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class raises a ValueError when the file is invalid

test_raise_error_for_invalid_size_board()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class raises a ValueError when the sudoku board is not 9x9

test_read_board_from_file_valid()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class reads a valid board correctly

test_warning_for_empty_board()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class raises a warning when the sudoku board is empty

test_warning_for_less_than_17_starting_values()[source]

Test that the SudokuBoard class raises a warning when the sudoku board contains less than 17 starting values as this could result in multiple solutions
